# ShelfLife

> ShelfLife is a free, offline-first Progressive Web App for organizing board game collections, deciding what to play, and logging plays in seconds.

## About

ShelfLife helps board gamers manage their physical game collections digitally. Users can import their games from BoardGameGeek, filter by player count and playing time, use a smart randomizer to pick games for game night, and log plays in under 10 seconds.

The app works offline — your collection lives on your device and syncs to the cloud when connected. It's installable as a PWA on phones and desktops.

## Key Features

- Import board game collection from BoardGameGeek
- Filter games by player count, playing time, and categories
- Random game picker for game night decisions
- Play logging in under 10 seconds
- Shareable public collection pages
- Offline-first architecture — works without internet
- Free tier with core features, Pro tier for power users

## Pricing

- Free: Up to 50 games, basic filters, random picker, play logging (last 10 plays)
- Pro: $4.99/month or $49/year — unlimited games, full stats, game night mode, wishlists, group picks
- Founders Deal: $39.99 one-time for lifetime Pro (limited to 500 spots)
